newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: PHILIPS SAYS ON TRACK WITH IMPROVEMENTS.
newsitem.headline: PHILIPS SAYS ON TRACK WITH IMPROVEMENTS.

text.p: Philips Electronics NV said on Thursday its first half result indicated that the improvement programme started in 1996 was track.

It added it remained committed to achieving the previously announced goal of double digit growth in operating income, a positive cash flow of over one billion guilders in 1997, and a 24 percent return on net assets in the longer term.
It said a number of the restructuring programmes, which were still under way, should contribute to profits in future quarters.
Philips reported earlier a total net profit for the second quarter 1997 of 747 million guilders versus a loss of 456 million guilders in the same period of 1996.
